clearcontrol.devices.cameras

Class StackCameraDeviceBase<Q extends StackCameraQueue<Q>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.devices.cameras.CameraDeviceBase
            • clearcontrol.devices.cameras.StackCameraDeviceBase<Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - queue type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, ReOpenDeviceInterface, QueueDeviceInterface<Q>, LoggingFeature, CameraDeviceInterface, StackCameraDeviceInterface<Q>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HamStackCamera, StackCameraDeviceSimulator

    public abstract class StackCameraDeviceBase<Q extends StackCameraQueue<Q>>
extends CameraDeviceBase
implements StackCameraDeviceInterface<Q>, LoggingFeature
    Base class providing common fields and methods for all stack camera devices.
    Author:
    royer
